column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat to the rescue! After we tried to go to another restaurant that offered reservations on Resy for MLK day but turned out to be closed
column2: I called an audible and we headed for Bosscat. Bosscat has consistently good drinks and an excellent whisk(e)y list. Their food is also very good. Most importantly
column3: they have outdoor seating and "indoor outdoor" seating
column4: which basically means you are under or right next to one of the huge roll-up doors. They follow COVID-19 best practices to the T. I was comfortable eating by one of the doors
column6: with masked servers and other precautions. I could tell they were committed to the safety of their customers and their staff.
